attributes.action: Bring Shisha smoking under the tobacco ban in public places
attributes.additional_details: We , the undersigned , believe that a ban on Shisha pipe smoking should be enforced in the same way as cigarette tobacco has been banned from public places . The World Health Organization has advised that a 40-minute session on a water pipe is is equivalent to the volume of smoke inhaled from at least a 100 cigarettes .There should be no distinction between the current legilation banning smoking in public places and that in Shisha bars/cafes .
